title: is 136 cs at 20 minute good for adc?
body:
Current rank: Silver 5
Last season rank: Silver 3
Goal rank (for now): Gold 5

So I was playing sivir and I had 136 cs at 20 minute, is that bad or good? Do you think a cs like that can make it to even gold?

replies.body:
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/65/Perfect_Creep_Score.png/revision/latest?cb=20111226174831

EDIT: So at 20 you have missed at least 100 CS (this includes for backing and such though).
can you expand the image? I can't really see it
I can't as it's straight off the wikia (i legitimately just googled max cs lol)

136cs is not that great for 20min especially with an ADC and yes, you can still reach Gold with that much cs but it would be much more efficient if you were achieving at least 170cs by 20min for your gameplay and your team.


For a start you should be aiming at least around 80cs by 10 minutes, 90 being your goal. For Sivir you should be able to clear cs easier in the beginning and even easier later with your W and as well as after purchasing items like {{item:3031}} or  {{item:3087}}  you can aim to reach 170-180cs by the 20 minute mark. And don't forgot ur Q as well, it can be useful if u deal enough damage with it.

Although enemies may be a problem with cs, just keep a clear head during ganks and try and dodge poke and engages from the enemy team, from champs like {{champion:53}}, {{champion:412}} or {{champion:89}} . Keep calm and keep up the csing! :)
I was against a blitzcrank and a ashe so I had to play really carefully.
